summary: This document contains various financial transactions involving JEGE, Inc. and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, detailing payments made for services and fees. The transactions include payments to individuals and companies for services related to aviation, maintenance, and other operational costs.

persons.name: William Hammond
persons.context: William Hammond is mentioned multiple times as a recipient of payments for pilot services and reimbursements.

persons.name: Joseph Smith
persons.context: Joseph Smith is referenced as a recipient of payments for maintenance services.

connections.description: William Hammond is employed as a pilot and receives payments from JEGE, Inc. for his services.
Joseph Smith is contracted for maintenance services and receives payments from JEGE, Inc.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter, B3, St. Thomas, USVI 00802-1348
keyFacts: Multiple payments were made to William Hammond for pilot services and reimbursements totaling significant amounts.
Joseph Smith received payments for maintenance services related to aviation.
JEGE, Inc. is involved in various financial transactions with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The document includes payments for quarterly rental fees and other operational costs.
Several payments were made to external service providers for aviation-related services.
